Natural.name: rule name
Natural.Dsl:
given FRD;
when This macro is ran then Make sure the debugger is stopped and Open the rule document ('Car Premium.xml') and Debug the rule ('Car Premium.xml') with loaded data ('TestData\\car-for-DRD.dc.json') and Make sure parameter window is activated end
when Make sure the debugger is stopped then FRD.Debugger.Stop() end
when Open the rule document {rule} then FRD.OpenDocument(rule) end
when Run the rule {rule} with loaded data {data} then FRD.Debugger.Run('DataComposer', rule, data) end
when Debug the rule {rule} with loaded data {data} then FRD.Debugger.Debug('DataComposer', rule, data) end
when Make sure parameter window is activated then FRD.ShowWindow('Parameters') end
